Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Asteraceae

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Asteraceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Asteraceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Cauline leaves narrow-oblong to linear, mostly less than 10 mm wide, green; upper cauline leaves entire; inflorescences spike-like panicles; capitula 1–3 per axil
Cauline leaves broad-oblong, more than 10 mm wide, glaucous; upper cauline leaves with toothed margins; inflorescences often pyramidal panicles; capitula 1 per axil
